name: Bario Aviation
about: Bario Aviation, founded in 2015 by Mario McGee, is a flight school based at Kelly Field in San Antonio, Texas. Dedicated to providing comprehensive flight training for all levels of pilots, the school offers programs for private, commercial, and multi-engine endorsements. Bario Aviation also provides maintenance services for aircraft owners. With a focus on helping students find jobs and enjoy the learning process, the school ensures class sizes are no larger than 20 students. The average cost for a private pilot license is around $14,000, and a commercial pilot license is approximately $70,000. Bario Aviation is committed to delivering high-quality training and support to its students.
